# The Products we have in the stock

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

products <- read.csv("C:/Users/160250/Desktop/BCG/BCG-Tech-Store/data/products.csv")

phones <- filter(products, Category == "Phone")
accessories <- filter(products, Category == "Accessories")

whatsapp_number <- "+263718834476"

```

## Phones

```{R}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

for(i in 1:nrow(phones)){
  cat("### ", phones$Name[i], " – $", phones$Price[i], "\n", sep = "")
  cat("![](", phones$ImageURL[i], "){width=200}\n", sep = "")
  cat("[Order on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/", whatsapp_number,
      "?text=", URLencode(phones$WhatsAppText[i]),
      "){.btn .btn-success target=\"_blank\"}\n\n", sep = "")
}

```
